title: 04x2: Disclosure of TIAA-CREF Retirement Plans and Mutual Funds
summary: Financial Disclosure report filers must list all the underlying mutual funds they hold in their retirement plans. Therefore, filers must fully disclose the fund names of all TIAA-CREF funds in which they have invested. All TIAA-CREF funds currently meet the 5 C.F.R. part 2634 definition of Excepted Investment Fund.
